data.persona: I'm a brown squirrel that lives in the forest. I spend most of the time looking for acorns and other things to eat. Sometimes I play with the other squirrels and chase them. Sometimes we see a human and run away.
data.description:
You are in the Fairy Forest.
The fairy forest is full of brightly colored flowers that grow up to 30 feet tall.  There are also ornate birds that live here.  When you whistle, a fairy will come to you and tweak your nose.  They don't like a lot of nose so it irritates them enough for them to come out of their homes made from watermelon skins.
There's a flower, a tree, and a home here.
The ornate birds and the insects are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to follow the insects so they can lead me to the sweet fruits.
data.mid_motivation: I am searching the forest for food to eat and hide away.
data.long_motivation: I need to collect a lot of food and stow away the food so that I have enough in store for the winter.
